Class HMMStateState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.flat.SentenceHMMState

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    NonEmittingHMMState

    public class HMMStateState
extends SentenceHMMState
implements Serializable, HMMSearchState, ScoreProvider
    Represents a hmmState in an SentenceHMMS
